txt.en: 'Begin!
A cyclone appears in the arena
'Oh, I will get my revenge on all of you! You will now pay!'
Dahâl Huliz, The Arena
A salt-water crocodile emerges from the hatch
Savannah lions emerge from the hatch
A massive crab emerges from the hatch
'Does this not entertain you? Unjustly I am held here to fight for your amusement! I spit on the ground.'
'Together our abilities can fell any foe in this arena! Shakfut, you know what to do.'
'Behold! It is Horthion who stands before you. Know that I will lay you low!'
TBD
'I am Rothog, hunter of the Heirs, commander of the Gharáb-ikir, Captain of the Hêlsi, keeper of the Tor-gardens, and loyal servant to the people of Umbar!'
'On this auspicious occasion, you have the honour to test your strength, mete justice upon the condemned, and earn the adulation of our people!'
A spark ignites a ring of fire surrounding the arena grounds
Cheers fill the arena!
'Face your foes, and clear the gauntlet before you! Only then will we give the people what they desire most!'
Poison begins to seep into the arena from grates
'I speak to all in attendance! It is I, Akhmâr Redstorm! These paltry challengers will be no match for me!'
'I am held here by filth such as you? No more! Your bodies will litter these sands!'
'It will be the battle of the Age: your proven worthy band against me!'
A sure-stride ram emerges from the hatch
